snippet: For Division I basketball, the median salary for coaches of a men’s team in 2010 was $329,300, nearly twice that of coaches for women’s teams, who had a median of $171,600.
abstract: Pay for women's college basketball coaches lags far behind that for men's coaches; for Division I basketball, the median salary for coaches of a men's team in 2010 was $329,300, nearly twice that of coaches for women's teams, who had a median of $171,600.

byline.original: By JAMES K. GENTRY and RAQUEL MEYER ALEXANDER

lead_paragraph: For Division I basketball, the median salary for coaches of a men’s team in 2010 was $329,300, nearly twice that of coaches for women’s teams, who had a median of $171,600.

headline.seo: Pay for Women’s Basketball Coaches Lags Far Behind Men’s Coaches
headline.main: Pay for Women’s Basketball Coaches Lags Far Behind That of Men’s Coaches
headline.print_headline: Pay for Women’s Basketball Coaches Lags Far Behind That of Men’s Coaches
